      • Core Battalion: Warlord

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Artefacts of Power

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Warlord


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required
        Core Battalion: Warlord 1-2 Commanders
        2-4 Sub-commanders
        1-2 Troops

    • Leader [1,055pts]

      • Saurus Astrolith Bearer [150pts]

        Selections: Celestite War-pick, Fearsome Jaws, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: HERO, SAURUS, ASTROLITH BEARER, TOTEM, ORDER, SERAPHON, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, COALESCED, THUNDER LIZARD

        Unit: Saurus Astrolith Bearer, Unit Abilities: Celestial Conduit, Revivifying Energies, Weapon: Celestite War-pick, Fearsome Jaws


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Saurus Astrolith Bearer 5"684+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Celestial Conduit Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly SERAPHON WIZARDS while they are within 12" of any models with this ability. In addition, add 6" to the range of any spells cast by friendly SERAPHON WIZARDS while they are within 12" of any models with this ability.
        Revivifying Energies Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly SERAPHON unit wholly within 12" of any models with this ability. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Celestite War-pick Melee1"33+3+-11
        Fearsome Jaws Melee1"14+3+-1

      • Saurus Scar-Veteran on Carnosaur [215pts]

        Selections: [The Thunder Lizard] Prime Warbeast, Amulet of Destiny, Celestite Warspear, Clawed Forelimbs, General, Massive Jaws, Warlord - 1-2 Commanders

        Categories: CARNOSAUR, HERO, ORDER, SERAPHON, MONSTER, SAURUS, SCAR-VETERAN, Leader, Behemoth, COALESCED, THUNDER LIZARD, Artefact, General

        (Wounds Suffered) Carnosaur: 00-02, 03-04, 05-07, 08-09, 10+, Artefact: Amulet of Destiny, Command Abilities: Saurian Savagery, Command Trait: Prime Warbeast, Unit: Saurus Scar-Veteran on Carnosaur, Unit Abilities: Blood Frenzy, Celestite Warspear, Cold Ferocity, Pinned Down, Terror, Weapon: Celestite Warspear (Scar-Veteran), Clawed Forelimbs, Massive Jaws


        (Wounds Suffered) Carnosaur MoveClawed ForelimbsMassive Jaws

        10+ 6"5+1
        Artefact Artefact Details
        Amulet of Destiny The bearer has a ward of 5+.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Saurian Savagery You can use this command ability in the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SAURUS unit wholly within 18" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by that friendly SAURUS unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Prime Warbeast Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the weapons used by this general's mount.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Saurus Scar-Veteran on Carnosaur *1284+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Blood Frenzy If any enemy models are slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks, for the rest of the battle this model can run and still charge in the same turn.
        Celestite Warspear Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Celestite Warspears if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.
        Cold Ferocity If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Celestite weapon by this model is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Pinned Down Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Massive Jaws if the target has a Wounds characteristic of 7 or less.
        Terror Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage

      • Skink Priest [80pts]

        Selections: Bless, Command Entourage - 2-3 Sub-Commanders, Fusil of Conflagration, Heal, Smite, Star-stone Staff, Starbolt

        Categories: HERO, SKINK, SERAPHON, ORDER, 9 or less wounds Leader, PRIEST, Leader, COALESCED, THUNDER LIZARD, Artefact

        Artefact: Fusil of Conflagration, Command Abilities: Herald of the Old Ones, Prayer: Bless, Heal, Smite, Unit: Skink Priest, Unit Abilities: Star-stone Staff, Weapon: Star-stone Staff, Starbolt


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Fusil of Conflagration In your shooting phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of the bearer and visible to them and roll a dice. On a 1 this artefact cannot be used again for the rest of the battle. On a 2-3 nothing happens. On a 4-5 that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 6 that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Herald of the Old Ones You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SKINK unit wholly within 18" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.
        Prayer Answer ValueRangeDescription
        Bless 412"Pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. Until the start of your next hero phase, that unit has a ward of 6+.
        Heal 312"Pick 1 friendly model within range and visible to the chanter. You can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to that model.
        Smite 248"Pick 1 enemy Priest within range and visible to the chanter. That enemy Priest suffers 1 mortal wound. If the chanting roll was 6 or more, that enemy Priest suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Skink Priest 8"465+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Star-stone Staff In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SKINK unit wholly within 12" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, until your next hero phase, that unit can run and still shoot and/or charge in the same turn, and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Star-stone Staff Melee1"14+4+-11
        Starbolt Missile18"24+3+-11

        Skink Starpriest (Magic) 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Blazing Starlight
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Blazing Starlight 618"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit.
        Hand of Glory 618"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Skink Starpriest 8"565+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Astral Herald At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice for this model. On a 5+, you receive 1 command point.
        Serpent Staff In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SERAPHON unit wholly within 12" of this model. If you do so, until your next hero phase, if the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by that unit is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase.

      • Slann Starmaster [265pts]

        Selections: 4. Itxi Grubs, 5. Stellar Tempest, Azure Lightning, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: ORDER, SERAPHON, SLANN, STARMASTER, WIZARD, HERO, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, COALESCED, THUNDER LIZARD, Artefact

        Artefact: Itxi Grubs, Command Abilities: Gift from the Heavens, Magic: Slann Starmaster (Magic), Spell: Arcane Bolt, Comet's Call, Mystic Shield, Stellar Tempest, Unit: Slann Starmaster, Unit Abilities: Arcane Vassal, Fly, Foresight, Masters of Order, Weapon: Azure Lightning


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Itxi Grubs At the start of each hero phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to the bearer. In addition, in your hero phase you can re-roll 1 casting or dispelling roll for the bearer, and in the enemy hero phase you can re-roll 1 unbinding roll for the bearer.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Gift from the Heavens You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SEREPHON unit wholly within 18" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, that unit can fly and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target that unit. You can only use this command ability once per hero phase.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Slann Starmaster (Magic) 3/3Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Comet's Call
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Comet's Call 7-If successfully cast, you can pick up to D3 different enemy units anywhere on the battlefield. Each of those units suffers D3 mortal wounds (roll separately for each). If the casting roll was 10+, pick up to D6 different enemy units instead of up to D3.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Stellar Tempest 824"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 24" of the caster and visible to them. Roll 1 dice for each model in that unit. For each 5+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Slann Starmaster 5"794+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Arcane Vassal When this model attempts to cast a spell, before making the casting roll, you can pick either 1 friendly SKINK WIZARD that is within 12" of this model or 1 friendly ORACLE anywhere on the battlefield. If you do so and the spell is successfully cast and not unbound, you must measure the range and visibility for the spell from that SKINK WIZARD or ORACLE.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Foresight At the start of your hero phase, if any friendly models with this ability are on the battlefield, roll 2 dice. For each 4+, you receive 1 command point.
        Masters of Order Add 1 to casting, dispelling and unbinding rolls for this model. In addition, this model can attempt to unbind enemy spells that are cast anywhere on the battlefield and attempt to dispel endless spells anywhere on the battlefield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Azure Lightning Melee3"64+3+-11

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Seraphon

          Battle Trait: Bound Endless Spells, Contemplation of the Ancient Ones, Secret Asterisms, Secret Asterisms: The Great Drake, The Hunter's Steed, The Sage's Staff

          • Coalesced

            Selections: The Thunder Lizard

            Categories: COALESCED

            Battle Trait: Cold-blooded, Predatory Fighters, Primeval Domain, Scaly Skin, Command Abilities: Trove of the Old One Technology, Unit Abilities: Mighty Beasts of War


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Bound Endless Spells Endless spells summoned by SERAPHON WIZARDS are bonded to the model that summoned them. A bonded endless spell is always controlled by the model to which it is bonded. A model cannot be bonded to more than one endless spell at the same time and cannot attempt to summon other endless spells while it is bonded. If the model that summoned the endless spell is removed from play, then the endless spell is removed from play.
        Cold-blooded Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) to the bravery characteristic of COALESCED units.
        Contemplation of the Ancient Ones At the end of your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SLANN and replace the spell they know from the Lore of Celestial Dominion table with a new spell from that table. Choose or roll for the new spell, rolling again if you generate the spell the SLANN already had.
        Predatory Fighters Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of jaws weapons used by COALESCED units.
        Primeval Domain If a terrain feature is partially or wholly within the territory of a COALESCED army, then it has the Mystical and Deadly Mysterious Terrain scenery rules (section 28.1.3 of the core rules) in addition to any other Mysterious Terrain scenery rules it may have. The Mystical scenery rule for these terrain features only applies to COALESCED units, while the Deadly scenery rule for these terrain features does not affect Coalesced units.
        Scaly Skin Subtract 1 from the damage inflicted by each successful attack that targets a COALESCED unit (to a minimum of 1).
        Secret Asterisms At the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 of the following asterisms to be in ascendance until your next hero phase: The Great Drake, The Hunter's Steed, or The Sage's Staff.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Trove of the Old One Technology You can use this command ability at the end of your shooting phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly THUNDER LIZARD BASTILADON or friendly THUNDER LIZARD ENGINE OF THE GODS that is wholly within 18" of a friendly THUNDER LIZARD HERO. If that unit is a BASTILADON, it can shoot with its Solar Engine even if it has already done so in that phase. If that unit is an ENGINE OF THE GODS, you can make a cosmic engine roll for it even if you have already done so in that phase. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.
        Secret Asterisms Effect
        The Great Drake In the combat phase, pick a friendly SERAPHON HERO. Until the end of that phase, you can add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by the HERO.
        The Hunter's Steed Add 1 to run and charge rolls for friendly SERAPHON units.
        The Sage's Staff At the start of the hero phase, pick 1 friendly SERAPHON WIZARD. You can add 1 to casting and dispelling rolls for that WIZARD if it is your hero phase, and you can add 1 to unbinding rolls for the WIZARD if it is the enemy hero phase.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Mighty Beasts of War Add 2 to the Wounds characteristic of THUNDER LIZARD MONSTERS

    • Game Options

      • Battle Tactics

        Categories: Game Options

        Battle Tactic: Aggressive Expansion, Bring It Down!, Broken Ranks, Conquer, Ferocious Advance, Monstrous Takeover, Savage Spearhead, Slay the Warlord


        Battle Tactic Description
        Aggressive Expansion When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 2 objective markers on the battlefield that are not wholly within your territory. You complete this battle tactic if you control both objective markers at the end of this turn.
        Bring It Down! When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 enemy MONSTER on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that enemy MONSTER was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.
        Broken Ranks When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 Battleline unit from your opponent’s starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that unit was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.
        Conquer When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield that your opponent controls. You complete this battle tactic if you control that objective marker at the end of this turn.
        Ferocious Advance When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 3 different units from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if all of the units you picked run in the following movement phase and finish that run within 3" of each other. If all 3 of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.
        Monstrous Takeover When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 MONSTER from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that MONSTER is contesting an objective marker that you control at the end of this turn, and that objective marker is not contested by an enemy MONSTER.
        Savage Spearhead You complete this battle tactic if there are 2 or more units from your starting army wholly within your opponent’s territory at the end of this turn. If 2 or more of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.
        Slay the Warlord You complete this battle tactic if the model chosen to be your opponent’s general is slain during this turn. If that model was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Beast Master

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Beast Master


        Grand Strategy Description
        Beast Master When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any MONSTERS from your starting army on the battlefield.

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Ghur

        Categories: Game Options

        Command Abilities: Feral Roar, Special Rules: Predators and Prey, Seismic Shift, Spell: Metamorphosis


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Feral Roar You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. The unit that receives the command must be a MONSTER. Until the end of that phase, when you look up a value on that unit's damage table, it is treated as if it has suffered 0 wounds.
        Special Rules Description
        Predators and Prey Once per battle round, you score 1 additional victory point if any enemy MONSTERS were slain in that battle round.
        Seismic Shift At the start of the third battle round, after the players roll off to determine who has the first turn, the player taking the second turn in that battle round can pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield and remove it from play.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Metamorphosis 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly HERO that is not a MONSTER and that is within range and visible to the caster. That HERO gains the MONSTER keyword until your next hero phase.

Force Rules

Seraphon Battle Traits:
Might of the Starborne: Pick 1 objective on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if you summon a f riendly unit that has a CCP cost of 20 or more during the turn, and that unit is wholly within 12" of the objective you picked.

Stampede of Scales: Pick 3 different friendly MONSTERS. You complete this battle tactic if all of the units you picked run in the following movement phase and finish that run within 6" of each other and wholly within enemy territory.
